extendedInfo.description: GO SMS Pro Message Counter plugin enables you to learn the dayly, monthly and cumulative send amount of SMS/MMS/GO Share/GO Share. It supports to set the settlement date, monthly combo limits and will notify you when reach the reminder value, can be a message flow secretary of your callphone. Need to install v4.31 or the latest GO SMS Pro.Main functions:- Count the SMS sent statistics- Count the MMS sent statistics- Pie chart shows the sent message percentage- Count the GO Share sent statistics- Count the GO Chat sent statistics (can distinguish text and multimedia messages)- Support counter settings- Support Limit reminder, tell your the current combo situationHow to download and install the message counter plug-in?- Click the icon in the GO SMS Pro Application Center and follow the tips to download and install.** Tips **Message counter need to be installed with GO SMS Pro v4.31 or the latest version, if your haven't installed or the version is too old, we suggest you to dowload or update your GO SMS Pro main program.** Related website **- Download the newest GO SMS Pro: 1.Search âGO SMS Proâ in google market; 2.https://market.android.com/details?id=com.jb.gosms- Visit our Blog: http://gosms.goforandroid.com- Visit our official website: http://www.goforandroid.com- Email to us: gomessanger@gmail.com- Visit our facebook profile: http://www.facebook.com/apps/application.php?id=178919808825035Thank you for your support very much.

reviews.title: Amazing add on.. superB....
reviews.comment: I really love this add On plugin... but need some more customization ...  * User can make it own SMS or MMS plan for daily /week/15 days/or month * After this improvement user who have 7 days sms bundles then can manage their sms. *-Please check my suggestions-*  Thanks GO Team for such a super app
reviews.author: Usman Akbar

reviews.title: Good app for single sim phones
reviews.comment: Great for single sim phones but can anybody plz tell me a sms app for dual sim phones? I am not able to send sms from my 2nd sim using this app..
reviews.author: Anshul Shah

reviews.title: Not the best
reviews.comment: Sorry but this causes a nuisance to me on my phone. It just doesn\'t really work as well as the built in app.
reviews.author: Rob Aston

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: It would appear on my phone right when I received My message ....I like this SMS messeging it\'s the best one :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Need to segregate local and national sms count
reviews.comment: I m a fan of go apps, but this app shows a common threshold for sms count setting including all sms. Would be useful to me, once it can segregate local from national. Pls let me know if it\'s doable.
reviews.author: Anupama Verma

reviews.title: What is remaining settlement day?
reviews.comment: I really like the GO SMS Pro and its widget which i put it in my homescreen.   But I dont understand this option under the Message Counter plugin. How can i reset the sms counter on lets say every 24th of the month?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It Sucks
reviews.comment: I\'m not getting a shortcut to check the details of the sms, i have to reijstall n open again n again, n searching for a new app.... Go to Hell!!!!!
reviews.author: Aftab Choudhary

reviews.title: Poor counter
reviews.comment: No daily sent sms count!!  Where is the count of Received messages???  These stats are poor. Improve a lot on it... Pls give detailed daily, monthly stats of both.SENT & RECEIVED SMS. Make it more accurate. Start your work on this plugin dev. Its needed!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Go Dev Listens to Users
reviews.comment: I remember e-mailing them to add this feature a month ago. Very helpful for people who get billed with each sms and mms sent. Thanks to the goDev team.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Silly
reviews.comment: No option for daily Sms limit. My plan has 100 Sms limit per day. How can I set limit for this? They have only heard about monthly plans!!! As it is seen in all their apps, the go Dev team focus on beautification of the interface and not quality. Every app has a thousand themes but has low intelligence level and poor utility value. They must understand that a smart phone user looks for intelligent and productive applications and not themes and pictures and colors.  Uninstalling the plugin.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works
reviews.comment: Works well but the new sandwich ice cream update does all this app can do. Good one to keep if you have use for it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Aweful
reviews.comment: Won\'t even open app on my samsung galaxy s
reviews.author: Vicky Epic

reviews.title: provide a link to open it from gosms app
reviews.comment: i am unable to find it in gosms app. have to come here to open it. silly issue.fix it asap. it would get atleast 4* then and 5* if recieved message count is added
reviews.author: sravan kumar

reviews.title: Waste
reviews.comment: Dis app is totally useless 4 me...firstly mine is a 150msgs per day limit and not a monthly plan....secondly I don need 2 pay every month as I can send msgs as long as I hav a min balance...lastly when I contact support Der is no reply or atleast a tnq 4 ur feedback...wat gives.??..plz fix these...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good start
reviews.comment: Need option to combine mms/sms counters as my provider counts sms/mms sent together toward the monthly limit.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: To All Those Leaving Bad Reviews...
reviews.comment: i keep reading so many bad reviews left by people stating that this is an unnecessary plugin and just eats memory and they dont need it. IT CLEARLY STATES IN THE TITLE WHAT IT DOES. IF YOU DO NOT NEED IT, DONT INSTALL IT! people with limited messaging plans would find this VERY useful. i used to have a limited messaging plan, and would go over all the time. i now have an unlimited plan, but still think this plugin is useful and does exactly what it says it does. i would only change one thing. i think it would be better if the plugin kept track of received messages as well. some carriers charge for received messages, so it would be good to keep track of those too.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lame.
reviews.comment: No easy easy to access the info.  Another clunky plug in to bog down an already over stuffed program.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cant see anymore
reviews.comment: Was teally helpful buy cant see this in go sms nemore.. :-( i hav to come in here n press open to open it.  :-(
reviews.author: Vish Rao

reviews.title: Good till the latest update
reviews.comment: This app was great until the latest update (5.01)  since I could easily check it out everyday to keep track of the amount of messages I sent. Now I have to come into the play store since it isn\'t located in the application center anymore. Please fix it so I don\'t have to keep doing that anymore and/or downgrade back to version 4.9. Please let me know and get back to me as I plan on doing that by tomorrow if nothing is or can be changed. Will rate 5 stars when changed.
reviews.author: Scott M

reviews.title: Samsung galaxy s duos
reviews.comment: Can\'t get counter icon anywhere.. It\'s irritating.
reviews.author: jegan tkd
